charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - defendant unlawfully, knowingly and intentionally possessed with intent to distribute a controlled substance,  which offense involved a quantity of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of a quantity of cocaine base, crack', in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(l) and 841(b)(1)(C).(1)

21:841A=ND.F On or about January 27, 2015 in Midland County in the Western District of Texas defendant did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute a quantity of cocaine base in violation of Title 21 USC 841(a)(1)
